title: "Soccer players demand change for rampant online racist abuse, turn to AI for protection"
excerpt: "Soccer authorities in England, including the Premier League, led a four-day social media boycott in 2021 across Twitter, Facebook and Instagram in a protest against racist abuse. It ended up being adopted by many other sports in England, and by FIFA and UEFA, the governing body of European soccer."
